summary: REQ-31 cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary because the relevant portion of `EarthquakeDashboard.tsx` is truncated right at the hero title, and the subtitle line is not visible. There are also unrelated modified metadata/summary files not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new subtitle line directly below the existing centered hero title, rendered as an H2 with exact text: "Latest real-time earthquake information around the world", styled as visually secondary, without changing the existing hero title text/alignment/layout.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet shows the hero section and a hero title element starting with "Real - Time Earthqua..." but is truncated before confirming the full unchanged title text and before any subtitle H2 is visible. Therefore the required subtitle presence, exact text, and placement cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/modified repository metadata/summary files not requested by the BuildRequest (e.g., project state and file summaries).
